title: [Partnered] V7 Hydra LF ADC Main
body:
Hey guys I'm Captain and I'm starting a Ranked 5s team and we are currently looking for a Adc main that was at least gold + in season 4 This team is looking to Play consistently and we will be looking to climb the Ranked ladder and growing as a team. We also will be looking to join tourneys when we are ready.

We will be practicing 
Monday starting at 9 est
Wednesday starting at 10:30 est
Friday starting at 9 est 
Saturday/Sundays will depend on what is going on 

Application
Role:
Best Champs:
Rank:
what will you bring to the team:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
why do you want to join this team:
mic and Teamspeak?
can you make the practice times?:
add me after FILLING OUT application Captain KTT

replies.body:
Role:ADC
Best Champs: Graves, Sivir, Corki, Jinx
Rank: Plat 4
what will you bring to the team: Someone who carries
Strengths: Know my power spikes and can kite
Weaknesses: Aggressive 
why do you want to join this team: Tired of soloq
mic and Teamspeak? yes
can you make the practice times?: yes

Role:ADC
Best Champs:I can play all adc's at a platinium level.
Rank:Platinum 4
what will you bring to the team: Calm collected and the team can rely on me.
Strengths:Good farming and get chemistry with my supports really fast.
Weaknesses: Have trouble positioning against assassin team comps.
why do you want to join this team:Need a team to call my own and make friends. I'm also competitive.
mic and Teamspeak? yes and yes but im a noob at TS3
can you make the practice times?:if its pm then yes.
add me after FILLING OUT application Captain KTT

ADC
I play all adc's equally other then miss fortune
Was Silver 1 last season i am currently silver 4
I have a lot of experience with 5v5 teams, and always listen to the shot caller
I have high cs and kill participation, and always try to be with the team over what is best for me
when i get far ahead i sometimes get to greedy
I have just finished all my college applications and finally want to join a ranked team again
Yes i have a mic
and practice times fit perfect with my daily schedual
